verse: These are the words of Amos, one of the shepherds in Tekoa, a city in the highlands of Judah. God gave him these visions regarding Israel in the time of Uzziah (who ruled Judah) and Jeroboam (the son of Joash, who ruled Israel) two years before the great earthquake.
Here is what the Eternal says about Tyre, that maritime power to the northwest:
Here is what the Eternal says about Edom, our neighbor to the southeast:
Here is what the Eternal says about Ammon, just northeast of the Jordan:
